# sotoon_service (Data Source)

Retrieves a service

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Load a service
data "sotoon_service" "compute" {
  name = "compute"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the service

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) ID (In fact service ID is same as it's name)
